title: Bug 2345 - Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file is already open
description: Bug 2345 - Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file is already open.
OB:
When following the steps in 1GEWMOZ:
1. Create a new basic project.
2. Create a new file named test.xml.
3. The default editor for XML files is the scripted resource editor example.
4. Select test.xml in the Navigator.
5. Right-click and choose Open With... / Default Text Editor.
6. Nothing happens; the scripted resource editor example is reactivated instead.

Searching for an existing open file should also consider the editor types.

Expected Behavior:
The selected file should open in a new editor, since the editor type is different.
EB:
